name: Iron Body Training
description: Develop endurance and conditioning through traditional Shaolin iron body techniques.

cards.title: Iron Palm Conditioning
cards.description: A training method to toughen the hands for striking without injury.
bulletpoints: Practice slapping sandbags for increased palm strength
Use progressive conditioning to avoid long-term damage
Focus on proper breathing to channel energy
cards.summaryText: Harden the palms with gradual sandbag strikes while breathing to protect the joints.

cards.title: Qigong Breath Control
cards.description: A breathing exercise to enhance internal energy and resilience.
bulletpoints: Inhale deeply through the nose and expand the diaphragm
Exhale slowly while focusing on energy circulation
Maintain a relaxed but powerful posture
cards.summaryText: Cycle deep qigong breaths to circulate energy and reinforce whole-body resilience.
